name: Shoot Your Shot (Digx7)
description:
Take a chance at building a romantic relationship by rolling the dice you’re given. Roll high enough and your relationship will move forward.  Roll too low and it all falls apart.  Can you make it all the way from Asking Out to Marriage?  Play above to find out.  

This game was originally planned for the GMTK 2022 game jam.  But got delayed due to life.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Drag and drop the dice into different slots to use them

Hit the roll button to roll

==================================================
